title: OxygenOS A.03 for the OnePlus 10R brings a host of optimizations and bug fixes
content:
Although OnePlus’ latest smartphone, the OnePlus 10R, has been on sale for just a few days, the company has already started rolling out a software update for the device. The OTA update (OxygenOS 12 A.03) brings a host of optimizations and bug fixes to the device, including system stability improvements, power consumption optimizations in certain

The post OxygenOS A.03 for the OnePlus 10R brings a host of optimizations and bug fixes appeared first on XDA.
description: OnePlus is rolling out OxygenOS A.03 to the OnePlus 10R, featuring several performance optimizations and bug fixes.
